1151.content: Tails hummed before noticing Sonic approaching. "Hey, Sonic." Sonic waved. "Hey, buddy! You wanted me to test something for ya? Better not be long..." Tails rolled his eyes. "Yes, yes, it won't be long..." He muttered under his breath. "... Until you're going to be a lot more reasonable." Sonic knocked on the tube before Tails typed on a keyboard, causing it to open up. "Okay, Sonic- Just walk inside, and remember to breath." Sonic walked inside and shrugged, folding his arms as the tube closed up. Tails was quick to type again, activating some kind of bright pink gas that obscured Sonic's form within the tube. Sonic himself twitched, but soon started becoming more comfortable as his form twisted and morphed to gain a far more feminine form while his mind subtly shifted to match what Tails wanted- A far more patient woman who wouldn't run off so much... Yet there was far more to do... Right? Tails pondered the possibility- After all, he had just salvaged some old tech, and he was curious to see just what might happen... But he had already succeeded in turning Sonic into a female...

1411312222.content:
A small grin appeared on Blaze's face. "All I did was make you beautiful. What do you think?" she asked the feminized hedgehog, bringing out a full-body mirror so her new friend could take a good look at herself.

"What do I think!? I think..." the furious Sonic began before looking into the mirror, all of her surprise and rage turning into astonishment. "Whoa..." As she explored her new feminine figure, she began to smile. She ran her hands down her curvy waist, stopping at her hips that blossomed out into child-bearing proportions. She twisted her body around to get a view of her plump, round buttocks, giving a short laugh as if satisfied. She reached her hands back up to cup her newly-formed breasts and gave them a little squeeze, then nuzzled her face up against them, enjoying their warmth. With her new body fully evaluated, she turned back to Blaze. "I think I could get used to this," she said with a grin, which Blaze happily returned. "I'm glad you like it. And don't worry, I've already informed the others, and they said they wouldn't hold this against you."

"Nice!" Sonic said, but then she came to a grim realization as her voice turned to panic. "But wait, what about my speed? How can I save the world if I can't even run?"

“OW OW OW” Sonic yelled as the pain of the corset compressing his body became too much

“Oh hush you big baby you are going to look beautiful” the woman said as she grabbed a pair of fake breasts

“OH NO THATS NOT GONNA HAPPEN” Sonic yelled as he slowly backed away

What happens next?

155321.content:
The chameleon sighed to himself as he made it back to Chaotix HQ after a long trip from home in the Dragon Kingdom in which he had an uncomfortable visit with his mother the Bride of the clan Constant Vigil. Vigil had criticized Espio for most of the time they were together whether it was Espio slacking off on his training, his current lifestyle, the fact he had t taken on any pupils, but most of all not providing a single grandchild that could be a strong future leader of their clan. After some time and multiple cups of tea consumed she managed to convince her son to start recruiting some of his allies to the clan as well as finding a wife suitable for making a great successor. At first Espio thought someone like Blaze would be great but he didn’t think she would be willing until Vigil showed him a special special herb the clan were able to recently make: it made the consumer suggestible to anything they heard from five minutes after they had the herbs for one hour which would make recruiting for new clan members easier, with this in mind sure he could make Blaze his wife but he could also use them to make someone build something for him that could say change the gender of someone else and that brought Sonic to mind but first he wanted to recruit his fellow Chaotix members to the clan.

“About time you got home!” Charmy shouted as he came flying out to greet Espio, “I’m surprised you waited for me the clan gave me some herbs to brew a special tea I want you and Vector to try.” The bee was going over to hug his companion until he heard that suggestion which gave him a look of disgust on his face as he started to back into the home. “EWW TEA IS GROSS!” However he was stopped from making it in as Vector stood in his path, “You’re going to shut up and drink it all you little brat and thank him afterwards!” Vector was not having any of Charmy’s shenanigans today as all three walked back inside, Espio making his way into the kitchen and brewing the tea in only about two minutes. “I finished the tea make sure to blow on it as it’s hot Charmy.” Espio walked out with two glasses full of the green tea and handed his companions each one, Charmy listened to the chameleon’s instructions and blew before taking a sip licking his lips after. “WOW THIS IS GREAT!” Vector chuckled as he started drinking it as well, “See Charmy now was trying it that bad?” The bee’s response was slow as he was too busy chucking the tea down so he gave a simple thumbs up. “I guess that’s all he will respond with.” Due to the size of Vector’s mouth it didn’t take long for him to drink it either but as the duo both finished they started appearing sluggish as Espio took their cups and smirked at them. “Mother was right, now you both will start training to be loyal member of the Shinobi Clan obeying any orders the Bride or myself give do you understand?” “Yes master...” Both of the detectives stated with their eyes glossed over, “As much as I would like to spend time training you here I have a mission to further attend to so while I am gone you both will clean this place up and use multiple scrolls in my room to use as research to figure out our techniques, skills, and history. Also if any potential client comes around give them a cup of the tea and recruit them to the cause I gave you only two cups so there’s far more than enough still ready.” The two would nod as Charmy went to find the scrolls and Vector started to clean up as Espio walked out the door ready to continue his grand mission.
155321.title: Espio

155322211.content:
As Charmy was coming to age his hormones began to flare out of control and with the knowledge that Saffron along with himself needed to repopulate his entire species thanks to Eggman he knew that he needed more women to impregnate which could be done as he created a large honeycomb filled with honey that could mold individuals trapped inside into whatever Charmy pleased. "I probably should add the greatest threat to me to the hive first..." thinking on who that was the bee called Sonic up with the Miles Electric Tails gave him a few years back with coordinates to the honeycomb requesting Sonic enter it.

Thinking it was an emergency Sonic arrived in only a few seconds, stopping only for a few seconds to show how he was so impressed on what he figured was Charmy's new home since he moved out of the Chaotix HQ before rushing inside. "Now where could that bee be?" Sonic looked around as he noticed two paths: one that functioned as a set of steps Sonic couldn't see the top of while the other was blocked by a large pile of somewhat see-through honey that Sonic could see a figure similar to Charmy on the other side unaware that it was a pile of honey Charmy made into his shape hoping Sonic would rush to it only to get trapped in the sticky honey.
